creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: eleven total lines with two large characters at far right; margin between first three lines and the rest; square relief stamp URC; oval relief stamp LLC
markings: URC, rectangular relief stamp; LLC, oval relief stamp; on back, LRQ, in pencil: [Irie Shikai]
title: Album leaf
